name: Kettle Brand Sea Salt Kettle Potato Chips, Gluten-Free, Non-GMO, 7.5 oz Bag
short_description: ORIGINAL SEA SALT CHIPS: Dusted with just the right amount of sea salt, Kettle Brand Sea Salt Kettle Potato Chips are the OG of all kettle chips
KETTLE COOKED: Cut perfectly from whole potatoes, Kettle Brand sea salt potato chips deliver the hearty crunch you crave
GLUTEN FREE AND NON-GMO: All of our kettle chips are Certified Gluten Free and Non-GMO
PANTRY-SIZE BAG: This 7.5-ounce bag contains about 8 servings and is perfect for stashing in your pantry to satisfy your cravings for salty snacks
THE PERFECT SIDEKICK TO SANDWICHES: Enjoy these sea salted chips on their own or as a side with sandwiches, burgers and more
product_description: Experience a classic worth crunching for with Kettle Brand Sea Salt Kettle Potato Chips. Kettle Brand Sea Salt Chips are the OG of all kettle chips. Dusted with just the right amount of sea salt, they've been looking like a snack since the beginning of snacks. Kettle Brand kettle cooked chips are cut perfectly from whole potatoes to deliver the delightful crunch you crave. All of our kettle cooked potato chips are Certified Gluten Free and Non-GMO. This 7.5-ounce bag contains about 8 servings and is perfect for stashing in your pantry so you can satisfy your craving for salty snacks whenever it strikes. Enjoy these sea salt potato chips on their own or as a side with sandwiches, burgers and more. When you open a bag of Kettle Brand chips, you know you're getting incredible kettle cooked chips made with authentic recipes by real people. In addition to Sea Salt, Kettle Brand gluten free chips are available in a wide range of flavors including Honey Dijon, Farmstead Ranch and Jalapeno. No matter the recipe, every hearty bite of Kettle Brand chips is packed with irresistibly bold flavor.

name: Popchips Potato Chips, Sea Salt Flavor, Snack Size Bags, 0.8oz (Pack of 24)
short_description: LIP-SMACKING FLAVOR: Sea Salt Popchips are light and crispy potato chips with a big, bold flavor. The classic taste is as moreish as chips & crisps come. Simply pop open a bag, sit back and enjoy the sensational salty flavors racing across your tongue. You?ll be torn between sharing the pop chips experience and keeping the deliciousness all to yourself

POPPED TO PERFECTION: Never fried, always real ? Popchips are nutritious potatoes heated in a special pressurized chamber. First, they?re splashed with good high-quality oleic oils, then massaged with our classic sea salt. When the salty chips are ready to be gobbled up they go POP! No grease or guilt, but all the crunchy deliciousness of regular fried potato chips ? yummy healthy snacks for adults and children to enjoy

HEALTHY ALTERNATIVE: Following a healthy lifestyle does not mean you need to have a limited or boring diet, the creators of Popchips have perfected the recipe to maximize health as well as flavor. One bag of our sea salt chips contains only 100 calories and only 3.5g of fat. What?s more, in a bag of our healthy chips there are 0 grams of trans fat as well as 0 grams of saturated fat. They are the perfect alternative to nacho chips and tortilla chips

MADE WITH EVERYONE IN MIND: Popchips are created with every customer in mind. Not only have the chips been officially certified as gluten free by the gluten free certification organization, but they are also totally vegan and non-GMO. The perfect diet snacks that can be enjoyed with any lifestyle - they will be certain to satisfy all lovers of salty snacks

ENDLESS DELICIOUS USES: You?ll be amazed by the endless ways to enjoy Popchips. Replace carb-heavy and diet-breaking toasts, chips and crackers with Popchips for a lighter and more flavorsome snack. Our blog is constantly updated with new ideas to satisfy our loyal customers. Favorite recipes include an assortment of chips and dips ideas, plus the more filling BLT-P(opchips) sandwich. Reignite your passion for food by experimenting with Popchips and all their scrumptious possibilities

name: Cape Cod Waves Potato Chips, Wavy Cut Sea Salt Kettle Chips, 7.5 Oz
short_description: Includes one (1) 7.5-ounce bag of Cape Cod waves sea salt chips
Uniquely ridge chips made one batch at a time, for a hearty crunch and a sturdy chip
Kettle chips with a hearty crunch and delectable flavor
Gluten-free snack with no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives
Every chip is an invitation to savor what's special about Cape Cod
product_description: Try the extra crunchy ridges and delectable flavor of Cape Cod Waves Original potato chips. Made with choice potatoes that are sliced in a wavy cut, these chips are then kettle cooked to deliver a ridged chip that is extra crunchy and full of flavor. The unique wave shape of these kettle chips is crafted to hold up to dip. Cape Cod Potato Chips are known for their quality taste, hearty crunch and distinctly remarkable flavors. These delicious chips are made with premium ingredients beginning with oil, salt and potatoes. Available in many traditional and unique varieties, Cape Cod Potato Chips maintain the tradition of using high quality ingredients in all its snacks.

product_description: Kettle Brand Air Fried Salt Sea & Vinegar kettle chips are batch cooked in kettles then air fried for a light and crispy crunch. Their balanced flavor of sea salt and tongue-puckering vinegar is the bold taste you expect from Kettle Brand, with 30% less fat than our regular Kettle Brand Sea Salt & Vinegar chips. Delight your taste buds with our take on this flavorful favorite. When you open a bag of our Kettle Brand air fried potato chips, you know you're getting incredible kettle chips made with authentic recipes by real people. From their farms to our kitchens and then to your home, the time and attention every Kettle Brand worker puts into their products is care you can trust. All that, plus Kettle Brand kettle cooked, air fried chips deliver a delicious snack that’s Non-GMO Project Verified, and Certified Gluten-Free. This 11.25-ounce party size bag of chips is great for parties, tailgates, and other gatherings.
